articles.author: Andrew Jeong, Frances Vinall, Kelsey Ables, Victoria Bisset, Bryan Pietsch, Sammy Westfall, Claire Parker, Steve Hendrix, Karen DeYoung, Miriam Berger, Samuel Granados, Leo Sands, Natalia Abbakumova, Noga Tarnopolsky, Naomi Schanen, Hazem Balousha, Cate Brown, Emily Rauhala, Marc Fisher, Karla Adam, Lee Powell, Zoeann Murphy, Ben Brasch, Trisha Thadani, Washington Post Staff, Dan Lamothe, Yasmeen Abutaleb, John Hudson, Michael Birnbaum, Susannah George
articles.title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Gaza deaths mount as Israel intensifies strikes; freed hostage speaks out - The Washington Post
articles.description: The United States is preparing for a worst-case scenario in which over 600,000 Americans will need to leave the Middle East if the war spreads, The Post reports.
